variation.name: 212-01 linkbase documentation element
variation.description: A valid documentation element as a child of a linkbase element. There are no attributes on the documentation element.

variation.name: 212-03 linkbase documentation element with an xml:lang attribute
variation.description: A documentation element as a child of a linkbase element but where the documentation element has a valid xml:lang attribute.

variation.name: 212-04 linkbase documentation element with an valid attribute
variation.description: A documentation element as a child of a linkbase element but where the documentation element has a valid attribute with an explicitly declared namespace.

variation.name: 212-05 linkbase documentation element with no content
variation.description: A documentation element as a child of a linkbase element but where the documentation element has no content.

variation.name: 212-06 extended link documentation element
variation.description: A valid documentation element as a child of an extended link. There are no attributes on the documentation element.

variation.name: 212-08 extended link documentation element with an xml:lang attribute
variation.description: A documentation element as a child of an extended link but where the documentation element has a valid xml:lang attribute.

variation.name: 212-09 extended link documentation element with a valid attribute
variation.description: A documentation element as a child of an extended link but where the documentation element has a valid attribute with an explicitly declared namespace.

variation.name: 212-10 extended link documentation element with no content
variation.description: A documentation element as a child of an extended link element but where the documentation element has no content.
